metadata.title: CVE-2024-34750 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Improper Handling of Exceptional Conditions, Uncontrolled ResourceConsumption vulnerability in Apache Tomcat. When processing an HTTP/2stream, Tomcat did not handle some cases of excessive HTTP headerscorrectly. This led to a miscounting of active HTTP/2 streams which in turnled to the use of an incorrect infinite timeout which allowed connectionsto remain open which should have been closed.This issue affects Apache Tomcat: from 11.0.0-M1 through 11.0.0-M20, from10.1.0-M1 through 10.1.24, from 9.0.0-M1 through 9.0.89.Users are recommended to upgrade to version 11.0.0-M21, 10.1.25 or 9.0.90,which fixes the issue.

criterions.comment: tomcat9 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
